sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: SUTRIUM (anc. geog.), a famous city, and an ancient colony of the Romans, the key of Etruria ; founded about ſeven years after the taking of Rome by the Gauls (Velleius). Now Sutri in St Peter’s patrimony, on the river Pozzolo ; ſurrounded on every side with rocks, 24 miles to the north west of Rome.
